title: Unboxing M3 Macs! Space Black M3 Max MacBook Pro and M3 iMac!
description: Had so much fun checking out the new M3 Macs! New M3 iMac and Space Black M3 Max MacBook Pro! Scary fast!   #BestBuyPartner #affiliate    PLEASE SUBSCRIBE:  GET MY PINK iJUSTINE CABLES HERE:   GET MY EDITING PLUGIN:    MUSIC I USE -   FRIEND ME HERE:        MY NEW PROJECT:   PODCAST:      BECOME A CHANNEL MEMBER:

That's pretty cool and, of course, it still has the awesome 4.5K retina display, Wi-Fi 6E support, built-in webcam, color match peripherals, and everything else that we love about the iMac. This does only come in the M3 configuration, so you aren't able to update it to the Pro or the Max, just the M3, but I'm probably most excited about this new MacBook Pro because I do travel so much and this is my main computer.
